name: Good Alien
description:
The game was created in 3 days for MashUp Game Jam 2.

Alien X-34Dw crashed into a human spaceship and, knowing that he has little time, he grabs what people call a "screwdriver" and searches for 3 chips to open the door to the alarm system to evacuate all the people.

Credits

kittyfelineeee - music (https://soundcloud.com/user-218582931)

MYline media - programmer/level designer

the davestroyer - artist/story (https://game-dav.itch.io/)
